title: wiki: WindowsCrossCompile page is out of date
body:
The [Windows Cross Compile instructions](https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/WindowsCrossCompiling) are for go1.4.x and lower, they should include instructions for go1.5.x as well.

# Building windows go programs on linux with Go â‰¥ 1.5.x

The above steps can be skipped if you are using go1.5.0 or higher.

```sh
env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build hello.go
```

This will produce `hello.exe`.
